name: Team 20 - Bitter Sweet
description:
A light hearted fun platformer game with different interactive surfaces; where the player can "eat parts of the environment" to carve a path for themselves.(edited)

In a cruise abroad gone wrong you have washed up on "Dessert Island" a mysterious and spectacular Island where everything (and everyone is made entirely of sweets)! Munch your way through levels to find your way back home, but who knows you may never want to leave at all!

A game made for the University of Portsmouth's Technical Demo Game Jam!

Controls:

Move: A/D

Jump: Space/W

Destroy biscuits: Shift/E

Created by:
Elliot Gorny - UP901366 [Design & Sound]
Lucy Adams - UP901327 [Artwork]
Ricky James - UP903258 [Programming]

All music created by and sourced from: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8_5m4Q4rL1Q

Tutorial used:

Primary tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BdlL5bwbCiI

Health UI tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5KwkfGfaRNU

Pause menu tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xIevsYi
